name: Get That Glow - GloPROu00ae Microneedling Tool & Discovery Set
about: What it is:A patented, award-winning micro-needling tool that maximizes skincare absorption for visibly firmer, smoother, more radiant skin with just 60 seconds of use a day..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes.Highlighted Ingredients:- Phyto-Marine Actives: Visibly diminish oil and fight breakouts..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The GloPROu00ae Microneedling Facial Regeneration Tool maximizes skincare absorption and supports collagen production for firmer-, smoother-, brighter-looking skin with less-visible fine lines, pores, and acne scarring. Combine it with The Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser and The ZenBubble Gel Cream for a visibly clear, calm, and glowing complexion..This Set Contains:- GloPROu00ae Microneedling Facial Regeneration Tool.Clinical Results:GloPROu00ae Microneedling Facial Regeneration Tool:
ingredients: -Phyto-Marine Actives: Visibly diminish oil and fight breakouts. .-Cica: Soothes irritation and calms skin. .-Chlorella vulgaris and B12: Visibly reduce redness, brighten dark circles, and smooth uneven texture. ..The Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Sodiumcocoylisethionate, Xanthan Gum, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Zingiber Officinale(Ginger) Root Extract, Bisabolol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate...The ZenBubble Gel Cream: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin,  Dimethicone,  Butylene Glycol, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone,  Microcrystalline Cellulose, PEG-9polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone,  Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Chlorella Vulgarisextract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol, Saccharide Isomerate, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone/Phenyl Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Cellulose Gum, Lactic Acid, Propanediol, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Chloride.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Cleanse with The Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser. .-Swipe skin with The Residue Eraser Treatment Pad (sold separately). .-Use the GloPROu00ae Microneedling Facial Regeneration Tool on your entire face for 60 seconds total, spending extra time on target areas (expression lines and areas of uneven tone and texture). .-Immediately apply The ZenBubble Gel Cream.

reviews.review_text: I contacted the company bcs mine was broken. They reached out but then disappeared never contacting me after many follow up emails. I would buy  something similar from a reputable company or a cosmetic surgeons office in case it breaks like mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super obsessed with micro-needling but didnu2019t want to spend thousands of dollars to see results. I decided this was the cheaper option and was excites to receive my kit. I used the kit regularly a few times a week for a month and didnu2019t see results from it. The worst thing is the extra products you receive with it is against your will and theyu2019re terrible. The face wash destroyed my skin and gave me a dry rash for weeks. The moisturizer is okay but burns so I donu2019t use it. I ended up doing reading on a home kit like this and it may work the first few times but the needles become dull over time and may not work or worse, damage your skin. Please save your money and donu2019t get this kit. If you can afford it, see a professional and decide if you even need micro-needling.

reviews.review_text: I noticed there wasnu2019t too many reviews that arenu2019t incentivized, so I thought I would post mine. I did my research before purchasing, because I wasnu2019t about to splurge (even at the sale price of 180$) until I knew for sure this was for me. I have deep acne scars from cystic acne that Iu2019ve had since I was a teen. I have an autoimmune disease inside my body makes acne a big challenge overall. Iu2019m always looking for new ways to help with my scars, and believe me Iu2019ve tried everything until I found this tool. These photos are with just one use, and I sharpened the photo to make sure it enhanced the look of my texture so you can get a true idea of what it can do on deep scars. I cannot wait to see how amazing my skin is going to look in months from now. If you consider picking this tool up wait until it goes on sale, or you get it for sale through the Sephora annual sales.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been looking at an at-home microneedling device for ages so I was so excited to be able to finally try one! At first, it's kind of scary to think you're putting needles on your skin but it's actually not bad.  The device is easy to use and surprisingly lightweight. It fits easily in your hand so you can just roll it across your skin without any issues. No pressure is needed - the needles do all the work on their own. If you turn it on, there's a light and some vibration. I can't say for sure that they definitely help at all but batteries are cheap enough that I don't see the harm in using those functions.  After using it, your skin gets a little flushed and some of the more bony parts (like the jaw line and around my forehead) can be a little painful because the skin is so thin, but let me tell you. The best part about this tool is that it absolutely enhances absorption of anything you put on after you use it. Seriously. Even if you don't have acne or fine lines, I have never seen anything help with product absorption like this thing.  I'm going to end up getting the other tip sizes for my lips and eyes.  10/10 do recommend.

reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to this device through the Huda Beauty hair loss video. This is a great tool and will pay for itself in the long haul, you can always replace the heads for as long as the body is intact. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The BeautyBio GloPRO Microneedling Rejuvenation Tool is by far my absolute favorite device for skin care! When I first started using it I didnu2019t believe it would help. I was looking to reduce the size of the pores on my face and I was also looking to help reduce some of the wrinkles and lines I had acquired. It did more than that! It has given me back the glow I used to have in my face, it reduced the size of the pores on my nose and cheeks, and it helped diminish some of the lines and wrinkles on my forehead. I am definitely more confident now, and I want to thank BeautyBio for helping me achieve that!

reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical about this product at first, but oh boy I see the difference in my skin! I used it for 30 days and I can clearly say my forehead lines improved and not as deep are. I really liked the product and would love to try more of the brand's items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this microneedling rejuvenation tool.  Iu2019ve been using it for more than few weeks and slowly slowly I see the results. Before Iu2019ve been using manual microneedling tool and it was so much more painful and these microneedling tool is so much better than manual itu2019s so much less painful. For the first few times it was a little bit sensitive for my skin but later on itu2019s really pain free and the needles are so thin that you donu2019t feel it that much now. Slowly slowly I can see results because my skin is very sensitive and I have early signs of aging small wrinkles, my skin texture is uneven and sometimes I have breakouts. I would say this GloPro tool definitely helping with my uneven texture and I realized that I started having less breakouts. I really like that it has a sanitizer. And itu2019s very easy to use just two-three times per week you can even use on your neck and du00e9colletage, and on your body, so definitely looking forward  to buying more heads for the body and eyes. This GloPro tool doesnu2019t give instant results but I can definitely say with the consistency and in the matter of some time you will definitely see the results. I have received this product complimentary.

After using this over the course of a month, I noticed that my face was also less dry and I had less blemishes than normal. So thankful I got to try this tool out! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would highly recommend BeautyBio GloPRO Microneedling RejuvenationTool. It did hurt a little bit the first few uses, but after that it worked so well.  It made my face feel amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. I'm in my thirties, and my skincare routine has become more important to me over the past few years as I've noticed fine lines becoming a little deeper. I also have some acne scarring from my early twenties. My skin is sensitive, so finding the right products has been a challenge. I have read great reviews for microneedling, but have been hesitant to try it due to my sensitivity. No worries needed with the GloPRO. I have been using it for a month now- and even though I used it sparingly at first, I can see and feel a difference. Both my lines and my acne scarring seem smaller, and my skin just feels healthier and smoother than it has with other products I've tried (such as facial rollers, cleansing brushes, and exfoliants). I did get pretty red after the first few uses, but that seemed to get better with each use. I'm not sure if that's because my skin got used to it, or I just got better about applying the right kind of pressure. Overall, it's simple to use and it is much more convenient (and cheaper) than scheduling facials every few weeks. I would absolutely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tool truly has to be one of the best at-home microneedling tools of all time with the added benefit of LED red light therapy.  It is easy to use, but you must make sure not to put extra pressure when rolling; just light as a feather application or you could get irritation.  Also, there needs to be more communication about what types of serums/moisturizers you should use after using the tool.  Certain serums really don't react well and others feel great. I'm still experimenting with what works best.  Also, you shouldn't work out afterwards because sweat will irritate your skin as well.  I can definitely see a difference the following day and I'm happy to have this tool in my arsenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I admit,  I was skeptical.  It seems at-home kits rarely perform as stated and leave so much to be desired.  The BeautyBio GloPRO microneedling rejuvenation tool exceeded all my expectations.  It is packaged beautifully and feels extremely luxurious.  It comes with everything needed and is ready to go straight from the box.   After 3 weeks of use,  I am already seeing an improvement in skin appearance.  Most notedly, my skin appears more dewy with a more dewy glow. I have not had any irritation from the GloPRO and can't wait to watch the continued improvement over the next 3-6 weeks!!!

This product helped to even out my skin and better absorb my serum and moisturizer so I no longer have dry patches. My forehead lines are also less noticeable now.

reviews.review_text: I was a little scared after receiving this, but was pleasantly surprised after my first use. It doesn't hurt at all, and feels really cool. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical when I first got introduced to this product. I eventually started using it and I'm so happy with my results. I had severe congestion on lower right side of my cheek area and it cleared it up amazingly! Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of those tools that once you have it you wonder how you ever lived without it! I use it about twice a week and have noticed a huge difference in my skin. I have dry skin and apply a few layers of products during my night time routine after cleansing (toner, serum, oil, moisturizer); in the past I felt like a lot of the product sat on top of my skin - with the BeautyBio it absorbs SO much better and my skin feels/looks more hydrated and firm. I'm also prone to hormonal breakouts and I feel like this has also helped diminish their appearance and fade them faster.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Pretty awesome if you keep at it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: To be straight up, I was very skeptical of this tool from the jump. I've used a multitude a products and tools that will promise to diminish fine lines and bring out a natural glow of the complexion and in reality the results are so so at best. This tool is pretty awesome however. I was nervous at first I had never done any sort of needling to my face so I wasn't sure if it was going to be uncomfortable or hurt even. However it was completely fine! I mean you can definitely feel the tiny needles going to work but totally pain free. And while the instructions warn of flushing, I had minimal redness, only a bit in the cheeks. My forehead was probably the worst because there's less cushioning there. Using three times a week before bed, at first I didn't really see very much difference, however 4 weeks later I can definitely tell that my frown lines were less and less visible! And my as time wore on, as well I began to see a more prominent glow to my morning complexion. My skin looked more supple, firm and even in tone. And especially used concurrently with the serum and moisturizer! The morning routine is an absolute game changer to your results too! I have been really, truly impressed with this tool! I honeslty can't wait to buy the lip attachment to see how that goes. It is on the pricier end, but with continued use use, you will see results making it totally worth the cost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

The first time I used it, it was slightly painful, especially on my forehead and my face was completely red and felt hot until the next morning. After continued use, between two to three times a week, itu2019s not as painful and my face gets only slightly red. My skin looks healthy and really does feel firmer. It made a slight improvement in my deep lines and some of my pores do appear to be smaller. This tool is super easy to use and something I would recommend trying.

reviews.review_text: I'm a huge skincare enthusiast and have been on a constant hunt for quality tools to supplement my routine, and to target some extra wrinkles and  texture. After consistently using the GloPro Microneedling Tool once every 5-6 days (BeautyBio recommends not exceeding using it twice per week; this rate worked best for me) for almost 3 months, I am a firm believer in the benefits! I use this immediately after cleansing in the shower. I sterilize the head before and after using, and always use BeautyBio's Skin Prep Pads before I get to rolling!! At first, I was very intimidated to use this, but the instructions are so clear and the tool itself is so user friendly... I can usually be found in bed using this! I've also been enjoying the extra compliments I've been getting! It's usually What have you been doing differently? Are you going to a spa? You look great! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: From first look, I fell in love. The gift set is really pretty, coming with not just the tool, but also a case, charger, a spray bottle for cleaning the tool, some face products, and batteries were even included! It was very presentable and also offered a nice way to neatly store all of the inclusions when itu2019s not in use. The needles on the tool are very gentle. They arenu2019t super long, which allows for a very comfortable microneedling session. They are virtually painless. I didnu2019t have any scars or unusual marks after using this. My face did sting a bit when applying serums and treatments immediately after using the tool, but that is also extremely understandable as the tool is meant to cause small openings for better product absorption. I used it for around 60 seconds-90 seconds around my face, concentrating a bit more on my unevenly textured problem areas. I ran the tool as instructed, first horizontally, then vertically, and then criss-cross while the tool is on with its infra-red light. I immediately applied my skincare products and went to sleep. The next morning, my skin appeared substantially plumper, and healthier. I had a better natural glow and my skin for sure absorbed all of the treatments. After a few more weeks of using this, my skin has noticeable positive results. The texture looks better and my skin looks plumper, fine lines are disappearing, and even my dark spots are lighter. It is a very travel friendly tool as it isnu2019t bulky. It is very easy to maintain, needing only a spritz of alcohol using the spray bottle that was included for cleaning (do not wipe the needles). Overall, it is amazing and a game changer in my books.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 35 and am beginning to see signs of aging in my face. I have tried many different tools and face serums without much luck. Either they do nothing significant for the time investment or cause a negative reaction (i.e breakout, dry skin, irritation). I should also mention that I have sensitive skin and am limited on what I can use due to this.  I am a bit of a skeptic so before using anything new, I always take pictures. I am very glad I did because after 30 days of use I didn't feel like there was much difference. BUT, I took more pictures at 30 days and am happy to say that there was in fact a difference. My 11 between my brows was reduced, my skin has a noticeable glow, my skin is smoother, and the few fine lines I have are less noticeable. It is easy to not see the changes in ourselves but pictures don't lie. I highly recommend that you take pictures also! I like that this product does not take long to add to my nightly skincare regime. While it is a little costly up front, if these results continue, it will be far less costly than any procedure. Plus it helps get the most out of my other skincare products. Overall, happy with the tool and excited to see the results a few more months down the road!

reviews.review_text: I have had several rounds of professional microneedling, and love the results it gives. I was skeptical of an in home tool, but this actually works really well and is super easy to use and clean!  The next day after using it, my skin just looks so bright and alive.  I get slightly pink right after use, but fades by morning.  I'm not sure if this will work as well as professional treatments... Maybe with prolonged use it can, but it is much less invasive. Overall I have seen improvement with texture, fine lines, and basically an elimination of a scar I had from stitches on my cheek as a child.
